mapper.select: select movie_id, movie_title, director, price from movies;
mapper.insert: insert into movies ( movie_id, movie_title, director, price ) values (#{movie_id}, #{movie_title}, #{director}, #{price});
mapper.select: select movie_id, movie_title, director, price from movies where movie_title Like concat ('%', #{searchWord}, '%') OR director Like concat ('%', #{searchWord}, '%');
